entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Penticton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 p.m. PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 13.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 3:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 24 km
